item.title: about
item.description: My name is Giorgia Ruggero alias Ampoule and i'm a italian digital illustrator and visual artist for animation movies! I've studied animation 2D at international school of comics, Rome. Actually working for Rhapsodia film S.R.L. as art director for animations. that’s my digital portfolio, get a look! Enjoy!
